prompts.name: Begin Work on Ticket
prompts.body: Start work on {{ticket}}. Use td to track progress.

prompts.name: Code Review Ticket
prompts.body: Do a detailed code review of {{ticket}}. Focus on correctness and tests.

prompts.name: Plan to Epic (No Impl)
prompts.body: Plan this task into an epic with sub-tasks using td. Do not implement yet.

prompts.name: Plan to Epic + Implement
prompts.body: Plan this task into an epic with sub-tasks using td, then implement them.

prompts.name: TD Review Session
prompts.body:
Start a td review session. Review open tasks, fix obvious bugs immediately, create tasks for larger issues.

Use: td usage --new-session
